pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP 3 or higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) P4/PE Core 2
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT220
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 271 MB available space
